name: Dots: Grow Bigger!
description:
You've gotta visualize the Dot.
You've gotta embrace the Dot.
You've gotta sniff the Dot.
You've gotta lick the Dot.
You've gotta wash the Dot!
You've gotta date the Dot!
YOU'VE GOT TO BE THE DOT!

Devour the smaller dots and absorb their very essence into your body. Avoid the menacing larger dots or something bad might happen!

See how many dots you can eat!
